[Verse 1]
In the hall of stone and flame
Minstrels sing the hero's name

Lovers lost and dragons slain
Echo in the bard's refrain

[Chorus â€“ Reprise]

Sing of loss and borrowed light
Every wound and every old regret
Lives forever in this duet

vocal.prompt: slow Celtic / Irish-inspired lament with emotional vocal, fiddle and tin whistle, gentle bodhrÃ¡n pulse, sad but beautiful, echo of ancient coastline and sea mist.

[Verse 1]
Where the mist rolls off the sea
Ghosts of home still sing to me

Names the tide will never show

[Chorus]

[Verse 3]

vocal.label: Cyberpunk Vocal
vocal.prompt: dark cyberpunk vocal track with steady electronic beat, gritty bass and clear melodic singing, brooding but catchy, suitable for a story cutscene in a neon-soaked city.

vocal.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Neon letters flicker out my name
Every shadow here is wired the same
Broken halos in the window glass
Play back every error from my past

[Pre-Chorus]
Signal fading, hearts in stand-by
But I won't power down tonight

[Chorus]

We draw our prayers in electric stars

[Verse 2]
Cracked asphalt and satellite light
Rust-red dawn after data-night
Every rooftop is a question mark
Every siren sings into the dark

[Bridge]
If the system says I'm out of time
I'll rewrite the code, redraw the line

[Chorus â€“ Reprise]
City of circuits, city of scars
We trade our dreams for electric bars
Lost in the static, searching for home
Two lonely signals on the same waveform

vocal.label: Space Opera Aria

vocal.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Drifting where the starlight sleeps
Past the edge of silver seas
Silent planets watch and keep
Every whispered memory

[Chorus]
Sing, horizon without end
Carry every broken friend
Through the dark we sail as one
Tiny sparks before the sun

[Verse 2]
Constellations etched in glass
Mark the years that slowly pass
Voices lost in cosmic rain
Rise and learn to sing again

[Bridge]
If this night should never fade
Let our echoes still be made
In the chambers of the sky
Where forgotten comets lie

[Chorus â€“ Reprise]
Sing, horizon without end
Name the stars we can't defend
Through the dark we sail as one

[Verse 1]
Circle drawn in ember light

[Verse 2]
Candles breathe in silver smoke
Every vow a fragile spoke
Turn the wheel and mark the hour

[Chorus]
By the root and by the flame

Let the broken paths align

[Verse 3]

vocal.label: Anime Ending Theme

[Verse 1]
Gravel kicking off my worn-out boots

[Chorus]
On this old country road tonight

[Verse 2]
Radio humming that familiar tune

I roll the window down and let it play

If this town forgets our names
Let the fields recall our games

[Chorus â€“ Reprise]
On this old country road tonight

vocal.label: Lo-fi Story Rap

Old cafe with a flicker in the sign

[Bridge]
If the city ever drowns us out

[Chorus â€“ Reprise]
Yeah I write it in a corner of the night
